docs.snippet: After the head of that sickening column rested at the Orchard Springs we still had a hope that somehow or other the leaders would be able to account for that fearful retreat, but that hope has now expired. They have no excuse to offer, and the famous...

headline.main: More About the Retreat Neglect and Cruelty Sacrifice of Public Property.

docs.lead_paragraph: After the head of that sickening column rested at the Orchard Springs we still had a hope that somehow or other the leaders would be able to account for that fearful retreat, but that hope has now expired. They have no excuse to offer, and the famous expedition to the Cumberland Gap had culminated in a rout more disgraceful than that from Bull Run.

docs.snippet: [The following letter from one of our correspondents, who accompanied the Great Expedition to Port Royal, reached us when our columns were too crowded to permit its prompt publication. Although it gives no facts not already known through the copious...

headline.main: THE GREAT EXPEDITION.; Another Report of its Doings The Voyage down the Coast Incidents of the Great Storm The Arrival off Port Royal Preliminary Movements Graphic Description of the Bombardment Flight of the Enemy.

docs.lead_paragraph: [The following letter from one of our correspondents, who accompanied the Great Expedition to Port Royal, reached us when our columns were too crowded to permit its prompt publication. Although it gives no facts not already known through the copious correspondence we have already published, it presents so graphic a narrative of the expedition, that it will still be read with interest. ED. TIMES.]

docs.snippet: MY DEAR: Perhaps before this you have heard of our brilliant victory, for a glorius affair was, and we have every reason to be proud of it.

headline.main: THE PORT ROYAL AFFAIR.; Extracts from a Letter received from a Young Officer of the Squadron.

docs.lead_paragraph: MY DEAR: Perhaps before this you have heard of our brilliant victory, for a glorius affair was, and we have every reason to be proud of it.
